review: Awesome device. I got it free with a 3 month subscription to Sling TV (which cost $60). I'm currently in the process of "cutting the cord" and the Sling app plus the Fire Stick have allowed me to have access to the majority of content I enjoy. This device gives you access to a ton of apps and runs pretty smooth over my WiFi.I experience occasional buffering but overall it's very reliable streaming. I'm very pleased with it and might eventually buy a second for another TV, but it's very easy to move around since it's plug and play. If you already have Amazon Prime this is a no brainer to access all of the content available to you.It's the bare bones of the Amazon Fire streaming devices, I'd recommend this to those that are just looking to access their streaming content over their TV, the games available are pretty basic and if you're really into games you should buy the box instead.
